repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: The Nālu Mantirik Katai, a narrative in Tamil about the adventures of four ministers. See Zvelebil (1995, p. 469).
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (December 2020).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

collation.desc: 1 folio = Nālu Mantirik Katai: Title Page. No foliation. Single folio. Verso blank. 340 x 35 mm.
54 folios = Nālu Mantirik Katai: Text. Tamil black ink pagination {1}, 2-54. 340 x 35 mm.
1 folio = Pācuvācakam. No foliation. Verso blank. 340 x 35 mm.
1 folio = Blessings. No foliation. Verso blank.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 420 (front cover, recto).

Shelfmark in black ink: N° 7 (f[1]r). This most probably refers to the number in Velanguani Arokium's catalogue (1845), first numbered list, which, however, by oversight, does not have a manuscript numbered 7 (p. 4).

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF. 340 x 35 mm.

origin.origDate: Internally dated to the year piṟamātūtu of the Jovian cycle, that is (?), piramātīca CE 1853-1854, 1793-1794, 1733-1734, etc. See colophon (U2, f54r6). Dated to circa 1770 by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-), to 1770 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments). Not after 1866 as mentioned in Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-). Not after 1833, as it is most probably a Reydellet manuscript acquired in that year by the 'Bibliothèque du roi'.

provenance.p: Most probably a manuscript owned by Reydellet as indicated by the shelfmark in black ink N° 7 (U1, f[1]r), which most probably refers to the number in Velanguani Arokium's catalogue (1845), first numbered list, which, however, by oversight, does not have a manuscript numbered 7 (p. 4). See item 19 (Exploits de quatre rois) in Liste des manuscrits Tamouls donnés à la Bibliothèque du Roi par M. Reydelet (NAF 5441, f311v).

acquisition.p: Received, May 27th, 1833, from Reydellet (officier de marine en retraite au Havre). See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1, no. 42 (Exploits de quatre rois).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 60, no. 420.
Velanguani Arokium [Vēḷāṅkaṇṇi Ārōkkiyam]. 1845. Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls de la Bibliothèque royale. BnF NAF 5443. — See p. 4.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 96r, no. 390 420.
Zvelebil, Kamil V. 1995. Lexicon of Tamil Literature. Leiden [etc.]: Brill.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, February 2023.

seg.seg:
hariḥ Om
naṉṟāka
kuru vāḷḻka
kuruvē tuṇai

body.ab:
hariḥ Om
naṉṟāka
kuru vāḷḻka
nālu mantiri katai
Aḻakāpuri y-eṉṟ' oru paṭṭaṇam uṇṭu Anta paṭṭaṇattukku Aḻakentiraṉ eṉṟ' oru rācā v-uṇ
ṭu Anta rācāvukku kōṭṭai y-eppaṭi Irukkum eṉṟāl
ṅ koṭuttu avar avar Aramaṉaikku Aṉuppi vicup pōṭṭu
virutuṭaṉē paṭṭattu Āṉaiyuṅ koṇṭu vantu kuṭuttu paṭṭaṇapiṟavēcam avar colli kaṭṭaḷai yiṭu Iṉimēl i
nta rācciyam ellām nīṅkaḷ p paṭi yalla veṉṟu caṅkīttātuṭāṇē nālu mantirimārai
yum Aṉuppiviccu pōṭṭut tāṉum cīmai yāṇṭu koṇṭu Iruntārkaḷ-āṉa paṭiyiṉālē
nālu mantirikkataiyai yātām oruvar paṭittōrum paṭikkac collik kēṭ=ṭa pērum marupiṟiti y-eḷḻuti
p paṭitta pērum makiḷḻcci kūrntu paripūṟṇamākak kēḷkkiṟa pērum Inta nālu mantirimārkaḷukk’ uṇṭāṉa Aṟivum
vipēkamum kalviyum meññāṉamum vittaiyum muttiyum puttiyum vīra-tattuva-piḷukkiṟamum poṟumaiyu viṭaṭcaṉi
kamum kaiviṣaṟtār vacaṉamum Intirapōkamum Aṣalaṭcimiyum porunti Aṭṭāṅka yōka-pōka-pākkiyattai
yum Aṇupivittuk koṇṭu yetirāḻiyaḷukku Oru ciṅkaṟu pōlavum iruntu cuppiṟamaṇiya-tiru-kiṭāṣca
ṭcaṇam uṇṭāki carikai kiṟukai yōkamu ṉāṉamum peṟṟu cāyuṭciyapataviyai Aṭaittu kayilāca-paṟuva
tam vaykunta-paṟuvatattil ttiruk kaṭavār ākavuM vēl uṇṭu viṉai y-illai piṟamātūtu varuṣam kārt=tikai mācam
28 tēti piṟaṇūr kaṇamāyi kāt=tikai-naccet=tiralē Uṭaiccu poṭacutu Aṉṉaiyil tiṉattilē vīrapattira
piḷḷai makaṉ mut=taṇaṉ piḷḷai nālu mantiri katai y-eḷḻutiṉēṉ vār ākilum paṭiccup poṭṭu Ēṭṭai
kuṭut=tu viṭavuM kuṭukātap poṉāl pāvattilē pōvaṉ Itu AṟiyavuM

naṉṟāka
